hadiths.text: It was narrated from Jabir that the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said:“in Al-Madinah there are men who, every time you crossed a valley or travelled a road, they shared with you in the reward. They were kept behind by (legitimate) excuses.”

chapter.ara-name: باب مَنْ حَبَسَهُ الْعُذْرُ عَنِ الْجِهَادِ
chapter.eng-name: One who is kept from Jihad by a (legitimate) excuse
